slip_stitch end of round i find it neater pattern uses us crochet terms this pattern is all worked in the back loop this will give the texture to the right side of the crochet 2 materials - yarn king cole riot chunky or similar self-striping chunky yarn - hooks 6 mm and 6 5 mm j and k - stitch marker - tapestry needle for weaving in ends - buttons optional gauge 12 stitches 11 row = 4 inches
